resources.string: NYC\'s Premiere UPK and Daycare Locator
NYC\'s premier PreSchool and DayCare Locator
Welcome to ResourcED! To get you better acquainted with the app, Let\'s show you around.
To acquire your app settings, press the hamburger button at the top left until you see the image below
Once you have chosen the resource that you would like more information on, enter the address to find the location nearest you
You would then choose your desired resource
You are now ready to use ResourcED!
